elements.name: question1
elements.title: What aspects of your work give you the most satisfaction or sense of accomplishment?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What aspects of your job currently reduce your motivation or energy at work?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Describe a recent work experience where you felt highly motivated. What contributed to that feeling?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: How motivated do you generally feel at work?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What personal or professional goals does your current role help you work toward?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Which factor most influences your motivation at work?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What kind of recognition or feedback makes you feel most motivated?

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Which of the following, if improved, would most increase your motivation? (Select all that apply)

elements.name: question9
elements.title: How supported do you feel by your manager or team, and why?

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Do you feel your work is valued by the organization?

elements.name: question11
elements.title: What changes could the organization make to better support your motivation and engagement?

elements.name: question12
elements.title: If you could change one thing about your job to make it more motivating, what would it be and why?
